0x9080363A.name: GET_EXTERNAL_KVP_STRING
0x9080363A.description: A getter for [SET_RESOURCE_KVP](#\_0x21C7A35B), but for a specified resource.

examples.code:
local kvpValue = GetExternalKvpString('food', 'codfish') 
if kvpValue then
	-- do something!
end

0x9080363A.resultsDescription: A string that contains the value stored in the Kvp or nil/null if none.
